chapters.title: Chapter 1: The Beginning
chapters.text:
[narrator] Once upon a time, in a small town nestled between rolling hills and a winding river, a curious traveler packed a satchel and stepped outside.
[hero] I will go on an adventure!
[villain] You cannot escape me...

chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Journey
chapters.text:
[narrator] The path climbed into the mountains, where stones told stories and winds carried whispers.
[hero] I will not give up, no matter how steep the climb.
[villain] Your courage will fail before the summit.

chapters.title: Chapter 3: The Turning
chapters.text:
[narrator] At the ridge, the traveler found a cairn draped in ribbons, each marked with a name and a promise.
[hero] This ribbonâ€¦ it belongs to my family.
[villain] Memories are chains, and chains are mine to pull.

chapters.title: Chapter 4: The Return
chapters.text:
[narrator] The descent carried new weight: lessons, losses, and the gentle resolve to begin again.
[hero] I have returned, stronger than before.
[villain] For now, but shadows wait in every corner...
